name: My First UDACITY Full Stack Developer Project
body:
Welcome to my first project where I am combining Python code with HTML content to allow for the display of my favorite movies.
Please review the readme file to see the content. By clicking on one of the movie posters it will play a trailer.
```
The list of movies are as follow:
* The Matrix
* Inception
* Equilibrium
* The Dark Knight
* The Dark Knight Rises
* Akira
* The Empire Strikes Back
* Return of the Jedi
* Attack of the Clone
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
